issue.title: [FCD] Ballot Comment CH-28
issue.discussion: Requiring wait_until makes it impossible to implement condition_variable correctly using respective objects provided by the operating system (i.e. implementing the native_handle() function) on many platforms (e.g. POSIX, Windows, MacOS X) or using the same object as for the condition variable proposed for C.
issue.resolution: Remove the wait_until functions or make them at least conditionally supported.
